content: **in the spirit of the ravellenic games - and because so many people have asked here is my basic pattern for the decathlon socks ** ***each*** sock takes around 50-60g of sock yarn the pattern is written for knitting on dpns but also can be worked magic loop style on two circulars or on one short circular as i did i used ten different colours of wollmeise twin sock yarn **top photo l to r ** ruby thursday tierra di sienna discontinued honigtopfchen discontinued olio vergine schwefel pinie nautilus admiral amethyst brombeere i have a lot of partial balls of sock yarn leftover from other projects so worked each sock in a different colour of the rainbow you can of course work the socks as a pair or in any colour combination that your heart desires and your stash allows have fun
